---
title: "import_v1_rollouts_not_supported.json"
---

## High-level description
This JSON file represents a configuration for feature flags in a system that does not support rollouts for version 1 imports. It defines a single feature flag with rollout information, which is likely used for testing or demonstration purposes.

## Symbols

### JSON Structure
#### Description
The JSON structure defines a configuration for feature flags, including version information and an array of flag definitions.

#### Internal Logic
The file contains a JSON object with two main properties:
1. `version`: Specifies the version of the configuration format (1.0).
2. `flags`: An array containing feature flag definitions.

Each flag in the `flags` array has the following properties:
- `key`: A unique identifier for the flag.
- `name`: A human-readable name for the flag.
- `description`: A brief explanation of the flag's purpose.
- `enabled`: A boolean indicating whether the flag is currently active.
- `rollouts`: An array of rollout configurations for the flag.

The rollout configuration includes:
- `description`: A description of the rollout.
- `threshold`: An object specifying the rollout parameters, including a percentage and a value.

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| version | string | "1.0" | Specifies the version of the configuration format |
| flags | array | N/A | Contains the list of feature flag definitions |

### Flag Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| key | string | N/A | Unique identifier for the flag |
| name | string | N/A | Human-readable name for the flag |
| description | string | N/A | Brief explanation of the flag's purpose |
| enabled | boolean | N/A | Indicates whether the flag is currently active |
| rollouts | array | N/A | Contains rollout configurations for the flag |

### Rollout Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| description | string | N/A | Description of the rollout |
| threshold | object | N/A | Specifies the rollout parameters |
| threshold.percentage | number | N/A | The percentage of users affected by the rollout |
| threshold.value | boolean | N/A | The value to be applied for the affected users |

## TODOs
The filename suggests that rollouts are not supported for version 1 imports. This implies that there might be a need to handle or ignore the rollout information when processing this configuration in a system that doesn't support rollouts for v1 imports.
